_comment: PAI Launcher Configuration - Separate from Claude Code settings for multi-environment support
_design_note: This file is intentionally separate from settings.json to support future CLI environments (gemini, opencode, etc.). Each environment may have its own settings.json equivalent, but pai-config.json is shared across all. Decision made 2025-12-15.

_autoUpdate_descriptions.notify: Check for updates on launch, show message if available
_autoUpdate_descriptions.auto: Run git pull automatically, notify if setup.sh needed (falls back to notify if local changes exist)
_autoUpdate_descriptions.off: Don't check for updates, don't mention it

_onLoad_descriptions.auto-load: Silently load project context if exists
_onLoad_descriptions.notify: Tell user context exists, don't auto-load

_onExit_descriptions.prompt: Ask user if they want to save context on exit
